title: CBC Life
text:
Well, your lack of planning really played out in your favour this year, because these two last minute Halloween costume ideas from Wendy Liu (aka withwendy) will actually be the talk of any party you go to. Friends old and new will be drawn to you for conversation — and snacks.

Watch the video to see how to assemble these topical and edible costumes in a hurry with zero-overthinking.

Get your "Hot Ones" interview question inspo here, and search YouTube to copy your favourite Mukbang artist techniques.
description: With these options, why would you settle for anything that’s not a snack??
